text: This is a list of WBC Muaythai world champions, showing every world champion certificated by the World Boxing Council Muaythai (WBC Muaythai). The WBC, which is one of the four major governing bodies in professional boxing, started certifying their own Muay Thai world champions in 19 different weight classes in 2005. == Super heavyweight == {| class="wikitable" width=100% |- ! style="width:1%;"|No. ! style="width:37%;"|Name ! style="width:20%;"|Date winning ! style="width:20%;"|Date losing ! data-sort-type="number" style="width:10%;"|Days ! data-sort-type="number" style="width:10%;"|Defenses |- align=center !1 |align=left | Edmoud M’Bulu-Monso / Ed Monso / Ed Monzo | March 21, 2009 | ?
